body_html:
The MNIST example downloads its dataset from http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist.
If this site is temporarily down or unreachable then the download will fail.

Please can you try accessing the URL directly in a web browser? (it is currently unreachable for me)
Once the page is accessible in a browser, then please try the tutorial again.
body_text:
The MNIST example downloads its dataset from http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist.
If this site is temporarily down or unreachable then the download will fail.
Please can you try accessing the URL directly in a web browser?  (it is currently unreachable for me)
Once the page is accessible in a browser, then please try the tutorial again.
body:
The MNIST example downloads its dataset from `http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist`.
If this site is temporarily down or unreachable then the download will fail. 

Please can you try accessing the URL directly in a web browser?  (it is currently unreachable for me) 
Once the page is accessible in a browser, then please try the tutorial again.
